data.title: Need assistance with SYBASE database Adaptive Server Anywhere 9
data.meta_description: Dear DB Gurus / LinkedIn Friends, A dear friend of mine has a client who needs assistance with their SYBASE database Adaptive Server Anywhere 9. They have admin rights to the Windows Server 2008 R2 Foundation that it runs on but they don't have the SA or similar password to the database itself.
